title: Hanging, 1950–60
medium:
Medium: linen warp, wool and linen weft
Technique: plain weave with discontinuous wefts (tapestry)
inscribed: initialed on both sides of bottom
dimensions: Warp x Weft: 214 x 140 cm (84 1/4 x 55 1/8 in.)
description: Hanging with a large-scale design of crocuses in bright red, violet, white, green, orange, gray and brown.

tombstone.epitaph:
Hanging, 1950–60.
1950–60. Medium: linen warp, wool and linen weft
Technique: plain weave with discontinuous wefts (tapestry). Gift of Elizabeth Gordon. 1964-24-41.
